channel.title: Need help
channel.description: need fast help, im new here tho winksmile 1. how can i change starting point ? (easy i quess) 2. how can i get bank booth and things to somewhere other place ? (i tryed in umm .... objects.cfg but it didnt work, where do i hawe to enter it ) 3. how i change npc drops ? (tried in npcdrops.cfg dident work shifty ) 4. how can i place npc,s? (i tried but i dont know why it didnt go ) well thats all 4 now winksmile im just new in this. oo 1 more thing, how i can remove/make new teleports on emote tabs ??? pleas some1 who reads this help me

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

if you need help with the shops just ask

Read full topic

item.description:

ye but it was a lot of help il do now little bit of coding and next il make new shop items, it will be hard worl, ty agane

Read full topic

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @kalakene kalakene
item.description:
@kalakene wrote:

[quote=“adog17x, post:2, topic:191866”]1. how can i change starting point ? (easy i quess)

players.java search // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper // initialization packet teleportToX = xxxx;// xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx;// xxxx;
change the xxxx to your coordas
2
. how can i get bank booth and things to somewhere other place ? (i tryed in umm … objects.cfg but it didnt work, where do i hawe to enter it )

Go in client.java search makeGlobal search twice

then you should see some Things, u’d need to copy paste on and change the idea like

makeGlobalObject(2603, 3417, 2029, -3, 10);//Statue

change the third number to bank booth id

  1. how i change npc drops ? (tried in npcdrops.cfg dident work shifty )

replace yours with this

[code]npcdrop = 2745 6570 1 50 //Rat drop/Iron 2handed/1 of it/30% chance drop.

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @adog17x adog17x
item.description:
@adog17x wrote:

  1. how can i change starting point ? (easy i quess)

players.java search // initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper // initialization packet teleportToX = xxxx;// xxxx; teleportToY = xxxx;// xxxx;
change the xxxx to your coordas
2
. how can i get bank booth and things to somewhere other place ? (i tryed in umm … objects.cfg but it didnt work, where do i hawe to enter it )

Go in client.java search makeGlobal search twice

then you should see some Things, u’d need to copy paste on and change the idea like

makeGlobalObject(2603, 3417, 2029, -3, 10);//Statue

change the third number to bank booth id

item.title: Need help

item.description:
@kalakene wrote:

  2. how can i get bank booth and things to somewhere other place ? (i tryed in umm … objects.cfg but it didnt work, where do i hawe to enter it )
  3. how i change npc drops ? (tried in npcdrops.cfg dident work shifty )
  4. how can i place npc,s? (i tried but i dont know why it didnt go )
    well thats all 4 now winksmile im just new in this.
    oo 1 more thing, how i can remove/make new teleports on emote tabs ???
    pleas some1 who reads this help me

Read full topic
